1. Définitions
   a. "Informations confidentielles" désigne toute information, qu’elle soit écrite, orale ou électronique, transmise par le Divulgateur au Destinataire, y compris mais sans s’y limiter aux données techniques, commerciales, financières et stratégiques."

Please translate this to Japanese and make sure the phrase “confidential information” is rendered consistently throughout the translation.

Sure, I’ll detect the language of the supplied text, fetch the preferred Japanese translation for the legal term “Informations confidentielles”, translate the NDA using that glossary entry, compare the source and target texts for consistency, and finally provide the Japanese version in markdown format.
